pokemon.name: bulbasaur
pokemon.dex: A strange seed was planted on its back at birth. The plant sprouts and grows with this POKéMON.

pokemon.name: ivysaur
pokemon.dex: When the bulb on its back grows large, it appears to lose the ability to stand on its hind legs.

pokemon.name: venusaur
pokemon.dex: The plant blooms when it is absorbing solar energy. It stays on the move to seek sunlight.

pokemon.name: charmander
pokemon.dex: Obviously prefers hot places. When it rains, steam is said to spout from the tip of its tail.

pokemon.name: charmeleon
pokemon.dex: When it swings its burning tail, it elevates the temperature to unbearably high levels.

pokemon.name: charizard
pokemon.dex: Spits fire that is hot enough to melt boulders. Known to cause forest fires unintentionally.

pokemon.name: squirtle
pokemon.dex: After birth, its back swells and hardens into a shell. Powerfully sprays foam from its mouth.

pokemon.name: wartortle
pokemon.dex: Often hides in water to stalk unwary prey. For swimming fast, it moves its ears to maintain balance.

pokemon.name: blastoise
pokemon.dex: A brutal Pokémon with pressurized water jets on its shell. They are used for high speed tackles.

pokemon.name: caterpie
pokemon.dex: Its short feet are tipped with suction pads that enable it to tirelessly climb slopes and walls.

pokemon.name: metapod
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon is vulnerable to attack while its shell is soft, exposing its weak and tender body.

pokemon.name: butterfree
pokemon.dex: In battle, it flaps its wings at high speed to release highly toxic dust into the air.

pokemon.name: weedle
pokemon.dex: Often found in forests, eating leaves. It has a sharp venomous stinger on its head.

pokemon.name: kakuna
pokemon.dex: Almost incapable of moving, this Pokémon can only harden its shell to protect itself from predators.

pokemon.name: beedrill
pokemon.dex: Flies at high speed and attacks using its large venomous stingers on its forelegs and tail.

pokemon.name: pidgey
pokemon.dex: A common sight in forests and woods. It flaps its wings at ground level to kick up blinding sand.

pokemon.name: pidgeotto
pokemon.dex: Very protective of its sprawling territorial area, this Pokémon will fiercely peck at any intruder.

pokemon.name: pidgeot
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon flies at Mach 2 speed, seeking prey. Its large talons are feared as wicked weapons.

pokemon.name: rattata
pokemon.dex: Bites anything when it attacks. Small and very quick, it is a common sight in many places.

pokemon.name: raticate
pokemon.dex: Its hind feet are webbed. They act as flippers, so it can swim in rivers and hunt for prey.

pokemon.name: spearow
pokemon.dex: Inept at flying high. However, it can fly around very fast to protect its territory.

pokemon.name: fearow
pokemon.dex: With its huge and magnificent wings, it can keep aloft without ever having to land for rest.

pokemon.name: ekans
pokemon.dex: A very common sight in grassland, etc. It flicks its tongue in and out to sense danger in its surroundings.

pokemon.name: arbok
pokemon.dex: It is rumored that the ferocious warning markings on its belly differ from area to area.

pokemon.name: pikachu
pokemon.dex: It keeps its tail raised to monitor its surroundings. If you yank its tail, it will try to bite you.

pokemon.name: raichu
pokemon.dex: Its long tail serves as a ground to protect itself from its own high voltage power.

pokemon.name: sandshrew
pokemon.dex: Its body is dry. When it gets cold at night, its hide is said to become coated with a fine dew.

pokemon.name: sandslash
pokemon.dex: It is skilled at slashing enemies with its claws. If broken, they start to grow back in a day.

pokemon.name: nidoran-f
pokemon.dex: A mild-mannered Pokémon that does not like to fight. Beware, its small horns secrete venom.

pokemon.name: nidorina
pokemon.dex: When resting deep in its burrow, its thorns always retract. This is proof that it is relaxed.

pokemon.name: nidoqueen
pokemon.dex: Tough scales cover the sturdy body of this Pokémon. It appears that the scales grow in cycles.

pokemon.name: nidoran-m
pokemon.dex: Stiffens its ears to sense danger. The larger its horns, the more powerful its secreted venom.

pokemon.name: nidorino
pokemon.dex: An aggressive Pokémon that is quick to attack. The horn on its head secretes a powerful venom.

pokemon.name: nidoking
pokemon.dex: It uses its powerful tail in battle to smash, constrict, then break the prey's bones.

pokemon.name: clefairy
pokemon.dex: Its magical and cute appeal has many admirers. It is rare and found only in certain areas.

pokemon.name: clefable
pokemon.dex: It has an acute sense of hearing. It can easily hear a pin being dropped nearly 1,100 yards away.

pokemon.name: vulpix
pokemon.dex: At the time of birth, it has just one tail. The tail splits from its tip as it grows older.

pokemon.name: ninetales
pokemon.dex: According to an enduring legend, 9 noble saints were united and reincarnated as this Pokémon.

pokemon.name: jigglypuff
pokemon.dex: Uses its alluring eyes to enrapture its foe. It then sings a pleasing melody that lulls the foe to sleep.

pokemon.name: wigglytuff
pokemon.dex: Its body is full of elasticity. By inhaling deeply, it can continue to inflate itself without limit.

pokemon.name: zubat
pokemon.dex: Forms colonies in perpetually dark places. Uses ultrasonic waves to identify and approach targets.

pokemon.name: golbat
pokemon.dex: Once it strikes, it will not stop draining energy from the victim even if it gets too heavy to fly.

pokemon.name: oddish
pokemon.dex: During the day, it keeps its face buried in the ground. At night, it wanders around sowing its seeds.

pokemon.name: gloom
pokemon.dex: The fluid that oozes from its mouth isn't drool. It is a nectar that is used to attract prey.

pokemon.name: vileplume
pokemon.dex: Flaps its broad flower petals to scatter its poisonous pollen. The flapping sound is very loud.

pokemon.name: paras
pokemon.dex: Burrows to suck tree roots. The mushrooms on its back grow by drawing nutrients from the bug host.

pokemon.name: parasect
pokemon.dex: The bug host is drained of energy by the mushrooms on its back. They appear to do all the thinking.

pokemon.name: venonat
pokemon.dex: Lives in the shadows of tall trees where it eats insects. It is attracted by light at night.

pokemon.name: venomoth
pokemon.dex: The dust-like scales covering its wings are color coded to indicate the kinds of poison it has.

pokemon.name: diglett
pokemon.dex: It prefers dark places. It spends most of its time underground, though it may pop up in caves.

pokemon.name: dugtrio
pokemon.dex: In battle, it digs through the ground and strikes the unsuspecting foe from an unexpected direction.

pokemon.name: meowth
pokemon.dex: All it does is sleep during the daytime. At night, it patrols its territory with its eyes aglow.

pokemon.name: persian
pokemon.dex: Although its fur has many admirers, it is tough to raise as a pet because of its fickle meanness.

pokemon.name: psyduck
pokemon.dex: While lulling its enemies with its vacant look, this wily Pokémon will use psychokinetic powers.

pokemon.name: golduck
pokemon.dex: Its slim and long limbs end in broad flippers. They are used for swimming gracefully in lakes.

pokemon.name: mankey
pokemon.dex: Extremely quick to anger. It could be docile one moment then thrashing away the next instant.

pokemon.name: primeape
pokemon.dex: Always furious and tenacious to boot. It will not abandon chasing its quarry until it is caught.

pokemon.name: growlithe
pokemon.dex: Very protective of its territory. It will bark and bite to repel intruders from its space.

pokemon.name: arcanine
pokemon.dex: A Pokémon that has been admired since the past for its beauty. It runs agilely as if on wings.

pokemon.name: poliwag
pokemon.dex: Its newly grown legs prevent it from running. It appears to prefer swimming than trying to stand.

pokemon.name: poliwhirl
pokemon.dex: Capable of living in or out of water. When out of water, it sweats to keep its body slimy.

pokemon.name: poliwrath
pokemon.dex: Swims powerfully using all the muscles in its body. It can even overtake champion swimmers.

pokemon.name: abra
pokemon.dex: It sleeps for 18 hours a day. It uses a variety of extrasensory powers even while asleep.

pokemon.name: kadabra
pokemon.dex: It emits special alpha waves from its body that induce headaches just by being close by.

pokemon.name: alakazam
pokemon.dex: It does not like physical attacks very much. Instead, it freely uses extra-sensory powers to defeat foes.

pokemon.name: machop
pokemon.dex: Loves to build its muscles. It trains in all styles of martial arts to become even stronger.

pokemon.name: machoke
pokemon.dex: Its formidable body never gets tired. It helps people by doing work such as the moving of heavy goods.

pokemon.name: machamp
pokemon.dex: Using its heavy muscles, it throws powerful punches that can send the victim clear over the horizon.

pokemon.name: bellsprout
pokemon.dex: Prefers hot and humid places. It ensnares tiny insects with its vines and devours them.

pokemon.name: weepinbell
pokemon.dex: When hungry, it swallows anything that moves. Its hapless prey is melted inside by strong acids.

pokemon.name: victreebel
pokemon.dex: Said to live in huge colonies deep in jungles, although no one has ever returned from there.

pokemon.name: tentacool
pokemon.dex: Its eyes are as transparent as crystals. From them, it shoots mysterious beams of light.

pokemon.name: tentacruel
pokemon.dex: The tentacles are normally kept short. On hunts, they are extended to ensnare and immobilize prey.

pokemon.name: geodude
pokemon.dex: Found in fields and mountains. Mistaking them for boulders, people often step or trip on them.

pokemon.name: graveler
pokemon.dex: Rolls down slopes to move. It rolls over any obstacle without slowing or changing its direction.

pokemon.name: golem
pokemon.dex: Once it sheds its skin, its body turns tender and whitish. Its hide hardens when it's exposed to air.

pokemon.name: ponyta
pokemon.dex: Capable of jumping incredibly high. Its hooves and sturdy legs absorb the impact of a hard landing.

pokemon.name: rapidash
pokemon.dex: Very competitive, this Pokémon will chase anything that moves fast in the hopes of racing it.

pokemon.name: slowpoke
pokemon.dex: Incredibly slow and sluggish. It is quite content to loll about without worrying about the time.

pokemon.name: slowbro
pokemon.dex: The Shellder that is latched onto ________'s tail is said to feed on the host's left over scraps.

pokemon.name: magnemite
pokemon.dex: It is born with the ability to defy gravity. It floats in air on powerful electromagnetic waves.

pokemon.name: magneton
pokemon.dex: Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6F degrees within 3,300 feet.

pokemon.name: farfetch'd
pokemon.dex: Lives where reedy plants grow. They are rarely seen, so it's thought their numbers are decreasing.

pokemon.name: doduo
pokemon.dex: Its short wings make flying difficult. Instead, this Pokémon runs at high speed on developed legs.

pokemon.name: dodrio
pokemon.dex: An odd species that is rarely found. The three heads respectively represent joy, sadness, and anger.

pokemon.name: seel
pokemon.dex: The protruding horn on its head is very hard. It is used for bashing through thick ice.

pokemon.name: dewgong
pokemon.dex: Stores thermal energy in its body. Swims at a steady 8 knots even in intensely cold waters.

pokemon.name: grimer
pokemon.dex: Appears in filthy areas. Thrives by sucking up polluted sludge that is pumped out of factories.

pokemon.name: muk
pokemon.dex: It is usually undetectable because it blends in with the ground. Touching it can cause terrible poisoning.

pokemon.name: shellder
pokemon.dex: Its hard shell repels any kind of attack. It is vulnerable only when its shell is open.

pokemon.name: cloister
pokemon.dex: When attacked, it launches its horns in quick volleys. Its innards have never been seen.

pokemon.name: gastly
pokemon.dex: Almost invisible, this gaseous Pokémon cloaks the target and puts it to sleep without notice.

pokemon.name: haunter
pokemon.dex: Because of its ability to slip through block walls, it is said to be from another dimension.

pokemon.name: gengar
pokemon.dex: It is said to emerge from darkness to steal the lives of those who become lost in mountains.

pokemon.name: onix
pokemon.dex: As it grows, the stone portions of its body harden to become similar to a diamond, but colored black.

pokemon.name: drowzee
pokemon.dex: If you sleep by it all the time, it will sometimes show you dreams it has eaten in the past.

pokemon.name: hypno
pokemon.dex: When it locks eyes with an enemy, it will use a mix of PSI moves such as Hypnosis and Confusion.

pokemon.name: krabby
pokemon.dex: Its pincers are not only powerful weapons, they are used for balance when walking sideways.

pokemon.name: kingler
pokemon.dex: Its large and hard pincer has 10,000-horsepower strength. However, being so big, it is unwieldy to move.

pokemon.name: voltorb
pokemon.dex: A life-form whose identity is unknown. It is said to Screech or suddenly SelfDestruct.

pokemon.name: electrode
pokemon.dex: It stores electric energy under very high pressure. It often explodes with little or no provocation.

pokemon.name: exeggcute
pokemon.dex: The heads attract each other and spin around. There must be 6 heads for it to maintain balance.

pokemon.name: exeggutor
pokemon.dex: Its cries are very noisy. This is because each of the 3 heads thinks about whatever it likes.

pokemon.name: cubone
pokemon.dex: Because it never removes its skull helmet, no one has ever seen this Pokémon's real face.

pokemon.name: marowak
pokemon.dex: It is small and was originally very weak. Its temperament turned ferocious when it began using bones.

pokemon.name: hitmonlee
pokemon.dex: When kicking, the sole of its foot turns as hard as a diamond on impact and destroys its enemy.

pokemon.name: hitmonchan
pokemon.dex: While apparently doing nothing, it fires punches in lightning fast volleys that are impossible to see.

pokemon.name: lickitung
pokemon.dex: Its tongue can be extended like a chameleon's. It leaves a tingling sensation when it licks enemies.

pokemon.name: koffing
pokemon.dex: Because it stores several kinds of toxic gases in its body, it is prone to exploding without warning.

pokemon.name: weezing
pokemon.dex: It lives and grows by absorbing dust, germs and poison gases that are contained in toxic waste and garbage.

pokemon.name: rhyhorn
pokemon.dex: Its massive bones are 1000 times harder than human bones. It can easily knock a trailer flying.

pokemon.name: rhydon
pokemon.dex: Protected by an armor-like hide, it is capable of living in molten lava of 3,600 degrees.

pokemon.name: chansey
pokemon.dex: A rare and elusive Pokémon that is said to bring happiness to those who manage to get it.

pokemon.name: tangela
pokemon.dex: The whole body is swathed with wide vines that are similar to seaweed. Its vines shake as it walks.

pokemon.name: kangaskhan
pokemon.dex: Raises its young in its belly pouch. Won't run from any fight to keep its young protected.

pokemon.name: horsea
pokemon.dex: Known to shoot down flying bugs with precision blasts of ink from the surface of the water.

pokemon.name: seadra
pokemon.dex: Its body bristles with sharp spikes. Carelessly trying to touch it could cause fainting from the spikes.

pokemon.name: goldeen
pokemon.dex: Its dorsal and pectoral fins are strongly developed like muscles. It can swim at a speed of five knots.

pokemon.name: seaking
pokemon.dex: In the autumn spawning season, they can be seen swimming powerfully up rivers and creeks.

pokemon.name: staryu
pokemon.dex: An enigmatic Pokémon that can effortlessly regenerate any appendage it loses in battle.

pokemon.name: starmie
pokemon.dex: This Pokémon has a geometric body. Because of its body, the locals suspect that it is an alien creature.

pokemon.name: mr. mime
pokemon.dex: It is adept at conning people. It is said to be able to create walls out of thin air by miming.

pokemon.name: scyther
pokemon.dex: With ninja-like agility and speed, it can create the illusion that there is more than one.

pokemon.name: jynx
pokemon.dex: It speaks using a language that sounds human. Research is under way to determine what is being said.

pokemon.name: electabuzz
pokemon.dex: Normally found near power plants, they can wander away and cause major blackouts in cities.

pokemon.name: magmar
pokemon.dex: Its body always burns with an orange glow that enables it to hide perfectly among flames.

pokemon.name: pinsir
pokemon.dex: If it fails to crush the victim in its pincers, it will swing it around and toss it hard.

pokemon.name: tauros
pokemon.dex: A rowdy Pokémon with a lot of stamina. Once running, it won't stop until it hits something.

pokemon.name: magikarp
pokemon.dex: In the distant past, it was somewhat stronger than the horribly weak descendants that exist today.

pokemon.name: gyarados
pokemon.dex: Rarely seen in the wild. Huge and vicious, it is capable of destroying entire cities in a rage.

pokemon.name: lapras
pokemon.dex: Its high intelligence enables it to understand human speech. It likes to ferry people on its back.

pokemon.name: ditto
pokemon.dex: It can freely recombine its own cellular structure to transform into other life-forms.

pokemon.name: eevee
pokemon.dex: Its genetic code is unstable, so it could evolve in a variety of ways. There are only a few alive.

pokemon.name: vaporeon
pokemon.dex: Lives close to water. Its long tail is ridged with a fin which is often mistaken for a mermaid's.

pokemon.name: jolteon
pokemon.dex: It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to blast out 10000-volt lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: flareon
pokemon.dex: When storing thermal energy in its body, its temperature could soar to over 1600 degrees.

pokemon.name: porygon
pokemon.dex: The only Pokémon people anticipate can fly into space. None has managed the feat yet, however.

pokemon.name: omanyte
pokemon.dex: Although long extinct, in rare cases, it can be genetically resurrected from fossils.

pokemon.name: omastar
pokemon.dex: Its tentacles are highly developed as if they are hands and feet. As soon as it ensnares prey, it bites.

pokemon.name: kabuto
pokemon.dex: A Pokémon that was resurrected from a fossil found in what was once the ocean floor eons ago.

pokemon.name: kabutops
pokemon.dex: Its sleek shape is perfect for swimming. It slashes prey with its claws and drains the body fluids.

pokemon.name: aerodactyl
pokemon.dex: A ferocious, prehistoric Pokémon that goes for the enemy's throat with its serrated saw-like fangs.

pokemon.name: snorlax
pokemon.dex: Will eat anything, even if the food happens to be a little moldy. It never gets an upset stomach.

pokemon.name: articuno
pokemon.dex: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear to doomed people who are lost in icy mountains.

pokemon.name: zapdos
pokemon.dex: A legendary bird Pokémon that is said to appear from clouds while dropping enormous lightning bolts.

pokemon.name: moltres
pokemon.dex: A legendary bird Pokémon. As it flaps its flaming wings, even the night sky will turn red.

pokemon.name: dratini
pokemon.dex: Even the young can exceed 6.5 feet in length. It grows larger by repeatedly shedding skin.

pokemon.name: dragonair
pokemon.dex: It is said to live in seas and lakes. Even though it has no wings, it has been seen flying occasionally.

pokemon.name: dragonite
pokemon.dex: An extremely rarely seen marine Pokémon. Its intelligence is said to match that of humans.

pokemon.name: mewtwo
pokemon.dex: A Pokémon whose genetic code was repeatedly recombined for research. It turned vicious as a result.

pokemon.name: mew
pokemon.dex: So rare that it is still said to be a mirage by many experts. Only a few people have seen it worldwide.
